judgment_text:
-1-
 IN THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY
 ORDINARY ORIGINAL CIVIL JURISDICTION
 Writ Petition No.2168 of 1988
Writ Petition No.2168 of 1988
Writ Petition No.2168 of 1988
 M/s.Bharmal Thread Works. .. .. Petitioner
 v/s.
 The Municipal Corporation of Gr.
 Bombay & ors. .. .. Respondents
 And
 Rizvi Estates and Hotels P.Ltd. .. Applicant
 With
 Writ Petition No.903 of 1993
Writ Petition No.903 of 1993
Writ Petition No.903 of 1993
 M/s.Hari Thread Works. .. .. Petitioners
 v/s.
 The Municipal Corporation of Gr.
 Bombay & ors. .. .. Respondents
 With
 Writ Petition No.1397 of 1993
Writ Petition No.1397 of 1993
Writ Petition No.1397 of 1993
 M/s.Laxmi Thread Works .. .. Petitioners
 v/s.
 The Municipal Corporation of
 Gr.Bombay & ors. .. .. Respondents
 Mr.P.M.Palshikar with Miss Trupti Puranik for
 B.M.C.
 Mr.M.J. Shetty for Respondent No.7 & 8.
 ------
 CORAM : SMT.R.S. DALVI, J. 
CORAM : SMT.R.S. DALVI, J. 
CORAM : SMT.R.S. DALVI, J. 
 DATED : 14th March, 2007
DATED : 14th March, 2007
DATED : 14th March, 2007
 P.C. :
P.C. :
P.C. :
 1. The representatives of all three
 Petitioners are present.
 -2-
 2. All parties state that the order dated
 19.1.2007 is a common order passed in all the
 above three Writ Petitions. The title of the
 order be changed accordingly.
 3. Respondent Nos.1 to 6 are the Bombay
 Municipal Corporation and its officers,
 respectively. Only Respondent Nos.7 and/or 8, who
 are the builders, are required to execute the
 sale-deed in favour of the Petitioners in the
 above three Petitions. Hence, in the third line
 of paragraph 1 of the order dated 19.1.2007 "Nos.7
 and 8" shall be added after the word
 "respondents".
 (Smt.R.S. Dalvi, J.)
(Smt.R.S. Dalvi, J.)
(Smt.R.S. Dalvi, J.)
